payload: The name of the company that issues the ETF
Exchange Traded Products fall under 2 broad categories: ETFs or ETNs
The general asset class exposure of this ETP
The general geographic exposure of this ETP
The general strategy employed by the fund manager to gain exposure
Assets Under Management. The total shares outstanding multiplied by the last closing price
ETFs that match the current one across various qualititive measures
Correlated ETFs as measured using 1 year of weekly returns
ETFs with a significant percentage of shared basket component weights
The date the fund was created
The fee charged by the fund manager
The Herfindahl Index calculation on basket weights. The score can range from 0 to 10000. A higher number indicates a higher degree of concentration risk
The number of components in the fund
The median weight of all fund constituents
The maximum weight of all fund constituents
The median spread of the ETF using 1-minute bid and offer quote samples across a number of days
The median displayed bid-side shares using a 1-minute sampled quote across a number of days
The median displayed offer-side shares using a 1-minute sampled quote across a number of days
